The Octane App
Fuel. Track. Control.

A smart wallet and AI-powered co-pilot for drivers and fleets

Get Octane Card Download App

For Fleets

Gain complete visibility, set limits, and manage expenses across every driver and vehicle — all from one dashboard.

For Drivers

Find the best fuel prices, pay instantly from the app, and track every dollar spent.

A Card You Can Trust

Fraud Protection

Each purchase is verified by location, time, and driver ID to prevent duplicate charges, fuel theft, and card misuse.

Certified

All connections are encrypted end-to-end, ensuring secure authentication, instant balance verification, and zero data exposure.

24/7 Agent Support

Trained agents provide immediate assistance with transactions, billing, or account management - with zero service fees.
